Name: Vimalraj Selvam
AboutMe:
I was discontinued from my graduation and started my career with Door-to-door marketing of Book products. After 3 years, started my graduation again in Information Technology.

My IT experience started with Web Development which I was doing as a Freelancer during my college days. Then joined in a reputed company after college and started the career with Manual testing.

After 6 months, moved to Automation testing with QTP. Then got a chance to automate the application with Ruby and fallen in love with it.

Now working in Python with Robot Framework. I'm always passionate about different frameworks. My long-term goal is to design an automation framework.
